text: How many major global trading sessions are typically recognized in financial markets?
answers: Frankfurt, Chicago, Hong Kong, São Paulo

text: What is the primary difference between an EMA and an SMA?
answers: SMA uses volume while EMA uses price
EMA reacts faster to recent price changes than SMA
SMA is only calculated on daily charts
EMA only works on crypto markets

text: What does the Chaikin Money Flow (CMF) indicator primarily measure?
answers: Buying and selling pressure based on volume and price location

text: What is the purpose of CME Settlement Levels on Coinwise charts?
answers: To show institutional reference prices from futures settlements
To mark daily support and resistance for retail traders
To replace VWAP and POC levels

text: Why are session overlaps (e.g. London–New York) important to traders?
answers: They often bring increased liquidity and volatility

text: What CPI value released during the CPI stream was described as “cool” and bullish by Mandalo?
According to Market Profile concepts, how long does the Initial Balance (IB) usually last?
What was the total prize pool for the Blofin trading competition mentioned by the Kimba Gang?
In Lions trading terminology, what does the phrase “dip the tip” describe?
answers: Putting 100% of an account into a single trade
Holding a trade through the entire weekend
A quick wick into a gap or level followed by an immediate reversal
Closing a position at the exact bottom

text: What major event occurs on the Friday following the CPI release, described as having “all powers combined”?
answers: Yearly, quarterly, monthly, and weekly options expiry (OpEx)
The launch of a new crypto exchange

text: Why does options expiry (OpEx) often increase market volatility?
answers: Large hedging and position rollovers occur

text: What theme is planned for the Liquania’s Got Talent show on Christmas Day?
answers: A retrospective on the year’s worst trades
A show consisting entirely of Christmas carols
An interview with the creator of Bitcoin

text: What price level must be reclaimed to open the door to higher targets like 125k?
Why do traders pay close attention to Initial Balance breaks?
answers: They remove the need for stop-losses
They often define the session’s directional bias

text: Why are CME settlement levels important reference points?
answers: Reflect where large institutional positions were settled
